name: Stellar Dust [Demo]
description:
Stellar Dust is a 2D Space Shooter with semi-open world and RPG elements.

Inspired by classic space shooters but you can freely move around, explore many sectors with cool space hazards, level up, change and upgrade your spaceships and complete quests. The game emphasizes on light effects and dynamic gameplay with large variety of weapons, player spaceships, enemies and sectors to discover. There is a wide range of spaceships with different playstyles from small fast fragile scout to big heavy frigates and capital ships. Each ship have 3 weapons to choose, ability,  secondary weapons/usables on ammo shared beetwen all ships and drones.

Full version will be released by the end of the year.

In full release there will be : 

-37 player spaceships

-60+ enemies

-25 sectors

-20+ different secondary weapons and drones

-25 quests
